Admissions

UG PROGRAMMES

Undergraduate

  • BE-Computer Science and Engineering
  • BE-Electronics and Communication Engineering
  • BE-Information Science and Engineering
  • BE-Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
  • BE-Artificial Intelligence and Data Science
  • BE-Computer Science & Engineering (AI and ML)
  • BE-Computer Science & Engineering (Data Science)

Online applications are now open for students wishing to enrol in undergraduate programmes.

For further information, you may also call the Admissions Hotline on 93429 00666.

Admissions Procedure

  • Candidates must fill in the registration form. This is to be done at the CMRIT College Campus.
  • Visit the Admissions Section, and meet the Admission Coordinator (Mrs. Revathi. R).
  • Admission fee details will be shared with the prospective candidate.
  • Once the seat has been confirmed, candidates may fill out the application form and submit it along with the documents specified below.

Required Documents:

The college requires that candidates submit the following documents at the time of admission. Note: A different set of documents is required for International students and Non-Resident Indians.

FOR INDIAN STUDENTS

FOR NRI STUDENTS

FOR FOREIGN STUDENTS

  • Bank Card of the entrance exam taken
  • SSLC / 10th Marks Card
  • PUC / 12th Marks Card or equivalent
  • Transfer Certificate
  • Conduct Certificate from the Principal of the institution last attended
  • Photographs: 4 Passport size, 1 Stamp size
  • Migration Certificate (for non-Karnataka Boards - ICSE, CBSE, etc.)
  • Study Certificate
  • Caste Certificate (if applicable)
  • Aadhar Card Copy
  • 12th Std Marks Card
  • 10th Std Marks Card
  • Transfer Certificate, Migration Certificate
  • Study Certificate
  • Passport Photo Copy
  • Photograph: Passport Size – 4 nos.
  • Photograph: Stamp Size – 1 nos.
  • Proof of parent working in Middle East (letter from the Company)
  • 'A' Level Marks Card (12th Standard)
  • 'O' Level Marks Card (10th Standard)
  • Course Completion Certificate
  • Association of Indian University Approval
  • Passport Photo Copy
  • Visa Photocopy
  • Photograph: Passport Size – 4 nos.
  • Photograph: Stamp Size – 1 nos.
  • All documents should be in English
